node.excerpt: Common native apps like Twitter or any app that allows you to share content outside of them provide support for a dialog that allows you to share their content into other apps that are installed on your phone. In this tutorial, we will take a look at how this is done.

node.excerpt: Common native apps like Twitter or any app that allows you to share content outside of them provide support for a dialog that allows you to share their content into other apps that are installed on your phone. In this tutorial, we will take a look at how this is done.
